TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit NSMutableCopying_Extensions extends System.Object

summary.para: Extension methods to the interface to support all the methods from the protocol.

remarks.para: The extension methods for allow developers to treat instances of the interface as having all the optional methods of the original protocol. Since the interface only contains the required members, these extension methods allow developers to call the optional members of the protocol.

MemberSignature.Value: public static MonoTouch.Foundation.NSObject MutableCopy (this MonoTouch.Foundation.INSMutableCopying This, MonoTouch.Foundation.NSZone zone);
.method public static hidebysig class MonoTouch.Foundation.NSObject MutableCopy(class MonoTouch.Foundation.INSMutableCopying This, class MonoTouch.Foundation.NSZone zone) cil managed

Docs.param: The instance on which this extension method operates on.
Zone to use to allocate this object, or null to use the default zone.
Docs.summary: Creates a copy of this object, allocating memory from the specified zone or from the default zone if the argument is null.
